make moot the question of who the boss is. At the same time, digital tools hold great meaning for these millennials. Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in an August interview with The Wall Street Journal, I actually think most people don't want Google to answer their questions. They want Google to tell them what they should be doing next. This suggests that we are on the cusp of a generation that lets the tools tell them where they should go.? The situational lens.
